title: Product Links
description: Schema for defining a list of related web links for a product (dev.ocp.product.links@1.0).

rel.description: Describes the relationship of the linked resource. Aligns with IANA link relations.

href.description: The URL of the linked resource.

title.description: A human-readable title for the link.

type.description: The MIME type of the linked resource (e.g., 'text/html', 'application/pdf').

hreflang.description: The language of the linked resource (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr').
